snippet.title: Longplay of LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1-4
snippet.description:
Longplay of LEGO Harry Potter: Years 1-4, played as the NTSC version on the Nintendo DS. This game's version was released on June 29th, 2010. Tell us what you think by leaving a comment down below!

0:00:00 - Start
0:00:37 - Privet Drive
0:07:23 - Gringotts Vaults
0:10:46 - Shopping in Diagon Alley
0:16:24 - Platform 9 3/4
0:18:33 - Gryffindor House
0:23:17 - Transfiguration
0:25:34 - Flying Lesson
0:29:59 - The Trophy Room
0:32:27 - The Mountain Troll
0:38:01 - Incendio
0:39:44 - Potions Class
0:43:00 - The Quidditch Match
0:48:22 - The Restricted Section
0:55:56 - The Lumos Charm
0:59:06 - The Forbidden Forest
1:06:35 - The Forbidden Corridor
1:14:40 - The Burrow
1:20:20 - Borgin and Burkes
1:26:53 - Arresto Momento
1:31:58 - Collecting Ingredients
1:38:33 - The Duelling Club
1:43:09 - The Polyjuice Potion
1:51:30 - The Slytherin Common Room
1:59:27 - The Revelio Charm
2:02:05 - Tom Riddle's Diary
2:10:32 - The Descendo Charm
2:13:26 - The Spider Hollow
2:22:21 - The Chamber of Secrets
2:36:34 - The Hogwarts Express
2:43:41 - Care of Magical Creatures
2:46:45 - Banishing Boggarts
2:49:46 - Hogsmeade Village
3:06:54 - The Patronus Charm
3:11:11 - Pursuin Peter Pettigrew
3:23:06 - The Shrieking Shack
3:35:20 - The Time-Turner
3:48:59 - Freeing Sirius
3:57:19 - The Quidditch World Cup
4:05:03 - The Summoning Charm
4:07:36 - Unlocking O.W.L. Revision
4:09:33 - The First Task
4:19:20 - The Prefect's Bathroom
4:23:44 - The Second Task
4:32:25 - The Third Task
 
By: Llighty
